column1: Local Foods////There are already a lot of raving reviews for Local Foods
column2: so I will probably keep this short. Out of all the places in Rice Village
column3: Local Foods ranks in my top three (along with Torchy's and benjy's). I've tried a few of the sandwiches
column4: and my favorites are the truffled egg on the pretzel bun
column6: and the gulf shrimp & blue crab sandwich.
